feed.title: PeaNUT Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v4.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • New Crowdin translations by GitHub Action by @github-actions in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/128
  • doc: update homepage README link by @TO19 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/129
  • re-use existing connection on getData endpoint by @rmlamarche in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/130
  • Add API endpoint for executing commands on devices and related tests by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/127

New Contributors

  • @TO19 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/129
  • @rmlamarche made their first contribution in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/130

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v4.2.1...v4.3.0

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v4.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Reduce CPU load from InfluxDB by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/133
  • Switch to Material UI Charts by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/134
  • Add Language Switcher by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/135

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v4.3.0...v4.4.0

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v4.4.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix chokidar on NFS by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/143

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v4.4.0...v4.4.1

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v4.4.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Final chart touchups by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/146
  • Update it translations by @ildoc in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/150
  • Fix broken environment variables by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/148

New Contributors
